page.title: 08WILDLIFE IN SOUTH DEVON cont
page.content: divided in opinion as to whether badgers cause the spread of bovine tuberculosis and so to some badgers are a dangerous pest which must be exterminated.However,this idea is becoming less popular nowadays. Unfortunately there is quite a lot of illegal killing of animals, mainly badgers and foxes,whose underground dens are dug up or for whom traps are set.Traps in particular are very cruel because the animals suffer so;and,of course,they do not discriminate so that domestic pets can also be caught. The RSPCA are very concerned about this,but so far they have not managed to catch anyone.
